meanings.definition: The state or condition of being available to interact or exchange with each other.
meanings.sent1: The interavailability of information between the two departments improved communication.
meanings.sent2: The interavailability of resources between the teams facilitated collaboration.
meanings.sent3: The interavailability of snacks at the party made everyone happy.
meanings.sent4: The interavailability of ideas sparked creativity in the group.
meanings.sent5: The interavailability of books in the library made studying easier.

meanings.definition: The ability of two or more things to be readily accessible or obtainable to each other.
meanings.sent1: The interavailability of tools in the workshop saved time for the workers.
meanings.sent2: The interavailability of files on the shared drive simplified the project.
meanings.sent3: The interavailability of socks in the drawer seemed magical.
meanings.sent4: The interavailability of solutions to the problem became clear after discussion.
meanings.sent5: The interavailability of ingredients in the kitchen inspired a new recipe.
